properties.name: Great Wall of China
properties.description: Built between the 3rd century BC and the 17th century AD, the Great Wall is the world's largest military structure.

properties.name: Taj Mahal
properties.description: An ivory-white marble mausoleum commissioned in 1632 by the Mughal emperor Shah Jahan.

properties.name: Great Barrier Reef
properties.description: The world's largest coral reef ecosystem, home to diverse marine life.

properties.name: Machu Picchu
properties.description: Built in the 15th century, Machu Picchu is the most significant tangible legacy of the Inca civilization.

properties.name: Pyramids of Giza
properties.description: The only surviving wonder of the ancient world, built as royal tombs during the Old Kingdom period.

properties.name: Angkor Wat
properties.description: The largest religious monument in the world, originally constructed as a Hindu temple dedicated to Vishnu.

properties.name: Yellowstone National Park
properties.description: The first national park in the world, known for its wildlife and unique geothermal features.

properties.name: Acropolis of Athens
properties.description: Ancient citadel containing the remains of several ancient Greek buildings of great architectural significance.

properties.name: Serengeti National Park
properties.description: Famous for its annual migration of wildebeest and home to numerous other wildlife species.

properties.name: Venice and its Lagoon
properties.description: A unique cultural and architectural heritage integrated with its extraordinary natural setting.

properties.name: Galapagos Islands
properties.description: Volcanic archipelago known for its unique wildlife that inspired Charles Darwin's theory of evolution.

properties.name: Petra
properties.description: Ancient city famous for its rock-cut architecture and water conduit system.

properties.name: Mont-Saint-Michel
properties.description: Gothic-style Benedictine abbey and village perched on a rocky islet in Normandy.

properties.name: Stonehenge
properties.description: Prehistoric monument consisting of a ring of standing stones, each around 13 feet high.

properties.name: Kilimanjaro National Park
properties.description: Home to Africa's highest peak and largest free-standing volcanic mass.
